name: Fax
description: Faxes API allows you to update and access fax jobs for both sending and receiving

retries.name: Retries
retries.description: The number of times to retry

attempts.name: Attempts
attempts.description: The number of attempts made, this will be set by the system and reset automaticly on put/post

from_name.name: Sender Name
from_name.description: The sender name for the fax

from_number.name: Sender Number
from_number.description: The sender number for the fax

to_name.name: Recipient Name
to_name.description: The recipient name for the fax

to_number.name: Recipient Number
to_number.description: The recipient number for the fax

document.description: Parameters related to the storage of a fax document

url.name: Document URL
url.description: The url of the fax document

method.name: Method
method.description: The method that should be used to reteive the document

host.name: HTTP Host
host.description: The host header to be used when fetching for transmission

referer.name: HTTP Referer
referer.description: The referer header to be used when fetching for transmission

content_type.name: HTTP Content-Type
content_type.description: The content type header to be used when fetching for transmission as a post

content.name: HTTP Body
content.description: The content provided in the body when fetching for transmission as a post

send_to.name: Email Address
send_to.description: A list or string of email recipent(s)

send_to.name: SMS Number
send_to.description: A list or string of sms recipent(s)

tx_result.description: The result of a transmission attempt

success.name: Success
success.description: True if the fax transmission was successful

error_message.name: Error Message
error_message.description: A description of any error that occured

time_elapsed.name: Elapsed Time
time_elapsed.description: The amount of time from submition to completion

fax_receiver_id.name: Reciever ID
fax_receiver_id.description: The receiver id reported by the remote fax device

fax_error_correction.name: Error Correction
fax_error_correction.description: True if fax error correction was used

callback.description: A URL to send results to

url.name: URL
url.description: The URL to call back with the results

method.name: Method
method.description: The HTTP method used for the callback

type.name: Content-Type
type.description: The content-type used for the body of the callback
